alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:14PM MST until January 08 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 36 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, Pierce, Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 8 PM MST /7 PM PST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
